channel.title: Next Review Date :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: Next Review Date field can be changed to a different date other than the default which is every day. A CDS can change the interval that the chart is routed back to a queue, when on the code summary page changing the calendar date field from the date displayed to a future date. This will tell the chart to not route back to the “Follow-up Review” until the current calendar date matches the date you changed the next review date to.
